name: NIR_England_National_Imaging_Registry
title: National Imaging Registry
description: put the short description of the profile here. it should explain what problem is being solved

resource.name: Discharge Disposition
resource.description:
UKCore contradicts NHS England HL7 v2 ADT mapped to FHIR using [HL7 Version 2 to FHIR](https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/v2-to-fhir/), which indicates for England this should be NHS Data Dictionary Discharge Method Code.

- [DISCHARGE METHOD CODE](https://www.datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/discharge_method_code__hospital_provider_spell_.html)
- [UKCoreDischargeMethod](https://simplifier.net/hl7fhirukcorer4/valueset-ukcore-dischargemethod)

resource.name: Document Index Class
resource.description:
- [Digital Health and Care Scotland - (EH4001) CLINICAL DOCUMENT INDEXING STANDARDS ](https://www.digihealthcare.scot/app/uploads/2024/05/CDI-Standard-V4.5-FINAL.pdf)
- [Switzerland DocumentEntry.classCode](https://fhir.ch/ig/ch-term/3.0.0/ValueSet-DocumentEntry.classCode.html)

resource.name: Document Index Type
resource.description:
- [Switzerland DocumentEntry.typeCode](https://fhir.ch/ig/ch-term/3.0.0/ValueSet-DocumentEntry.typeCode.html)
- [Digital Health and Care Scotland - (EH4001) CLINICAL DOCUMENT INDEXING STANDARDS ](https://www.digihealthcare.scot/app/uploads/2024/05/CDI-Standard-V4.5-FINAL.pdf)
- [UKCore DocumentType](https://simplifier.net/HL7FHIRUKCoreR4/ValueSet-UKCore-DocumentType), NHS England Terminology Browser [Refset 1127551000000109](https://termbrowser.nhs.uk/?perspective=full&conceptId1=1127551000000109&edition=uk-edition&release=v20240731&server=https://termbrowser.nhs.uk/sct-browser-api/snomed&langRefset=999001261000000100,999000691000001104)
- NHS England Data Dictionary [IMAGING CODE (SNOMED CT)](https://www.datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/imaging_code__snomed_ct_.html)
  - NHS England Terminology Browser [Refset 999001111000000105](https://termbrowser.nhs.uk/?perspective=full&conceptId1=999001111000000105&edition=uk-edition&release=v20240731&server=https://termbrowser.nhs.uk/sct-browser-api/snomed&langRefset=999001261000000100,999000691000001104)
- NHS England [National Interim Clinical Imaging Procedure code set](https://nhsengland.kahootz.com/t_c_home/view?objectID=45878224) which mentions a **ConceptMap** to SNOMED CT (according Data Dictionary for Care (DD4C) NICIP, and the SNOMED refset are all referring to the same procedures)
  - NHS England Data Dictionary [IMAGING CODE (SNOMED CT)](https://www.datadictionary.nhs.uk/data_elements/imaging_code__snomed_ct_.html)
  - NHS England Terminology Browser [Refset 999001111000000105](https://termbrowser.nhs.uk/?perspective=full&conceptId1=999001111000000105&edition=uk-edition&release=v20240731&server=https://termbrowser.nhs.uk/sct-browser-api/snomed&langRefset=999001261000000100,999000691000001104)

resource.name: NHS England DiagnosticReport
resource.description: NHS England DiagnosticReport Entity Model, based on data model [HL7 IPS DiagnosticReport](https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-ips/StructureDefinition-DiagnosticReport-uv-ips.html)

resource.name: NHS England Document
resource.description: Initial capture of data requirements for Document

resource.name: NHS England Image
resource.description: Initial capture of data requirements for Image

resource.name: NHS England ImagingStudy
resource.description: NHS England ImagingStudy Entity Model, based on data model [IHE Interactive Multimedia Report (IMR) ImagingStudy](https://build.fhir.org/ig/IHE/RAD.IMR/branches/master/StructureDefinition-imr-imagingstudy.html)

resource.name: NHS England Radiology ServiceRequest
resource.description: Port of Royal College of Radiologists HL7 v2 to FHIR

resource.name: Organisation Type
resource.description:
-  [eRS Organisation Type](https://fhir.nhs.uk/STU3/ValueSet/eRS-OrganisationType-1)
-  [ODS API Organization Role](https://directory.spineservices.nhs.uk/STU3/CodeSystem/ODSAPI-OrganizationRole-1)

Note ODS has mapped this to an extension

resource.name: ServiceProvision Code
resource.description:
E.g. [NICIP?](https://digital.nhs.uk/services/terminology-and-classifications/national-interim-clinical-imaging-procedure-nicip-code-set)

Not specified in eRS and BARS
